Brand Response: Hello Anuj, Thank you for sharing your feedback on the weight training wrist straps. We're sorry to hear that you found them stiff and uncomfortable for activity. We understand how important it is for accessories like these to be flexible and supportive during your workouts.  These wrist straps are designed to provide extra support for your wrists during weight training, and they are adjustable to fit your needs. While they are meant to be firm for stability, we understand that the stiffness might not be ideal for everyone. If the fit feels off, we recommend adjusting the straps to ensure a more comfortable and secure fit.  We truly appreciate your feedback, as it helps us improve the design and comfort of our products. Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope that with the right adjustments, youâ€™ll find the wrist straps more suited to your workouts in the future.  If you need any further assistance or tips on using them, feel free to reach out.  Sportingly, Sagar Gocher Sports ambassador Running United
